name: Finance Tracker
description: Introducing the Finance Tracker!Easily manage and visualize your expenses, savings and subscriptions, plan your monthly budget for every expense category, all in one place! With Finance Tracker, get a clear picture of where your money is going and monitor your financial health in order to make informed decisions about your money.FAQs:What is Notion ?Notion is a single space where you can think, write, and plan.
